definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="29" y="41"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation elseif="1"/><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="entity_iteminoffhand"/></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:ColPouch</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/title @p actionbar {"text":"Cannot convert in off-hand!"}</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="entity_pos_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="entity_pos_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="entity_pos_z"/></value></block></statement><value name="IF1"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="entity_iteminhand"/></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:ColPouch</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO1"><block type="entity_add_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MINUS</field><value name="A"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1024</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="item_get_damage"/></value></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Col</field></block></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">replaceitem entity @p slot.weapon.mainhand minecraft:air</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="entity_pos_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="entity_pos_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="entity_pos_z"/></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
